duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and negotiate potential real estate acquisitions and new store development opportunities.
Maintain strong market knowledge, analyze trends, and assess competition to identify real estate opportunities.
Develop and execute strategic market plans for new store growth and optimize store performance.
Manage the real estate network, prepare new site packages, and negotiate terms of lease or purchase contracts.
Participate in project status meetings, manage critical dates, and ensure project milestones are met.
Optimize new store performance through value engineering efforts and project management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Real Estate, Business, or a related field (MBA preferred)
